name: Galaxy Shooter (Flash Gaming)
description:
Galaxy Shooter

New Arcade game is pre-launched for testing and review based .Game contain continuous loop of space ship as main player with high quality environment and the cool enemy to attack and defend. 

Games Feature :- Triple attack, Bost the speed and the Defense shield .Game mechanism is easy to understand and play for everyone hope so everyone have enjoy game. 

CONTROL Key :- 

1. W(to move forward) 

2.S(to move backward) 

3.A(To move left )

4.D(to move right)

5.Spacebar(to shot the laser attack to destroy enemy and defend the player)

                                                "Game Also Available online resource"
